directions: Select the best answer for each question. Note that many questions have more than one possible answer, but of the choices offered, only one is correct.

questions.text: The letter 't' can stand for the quantity 'time' in physics. What can we call 't' ?

answerChoices.text: t is the symbol for time
t is the vector of time
t is the unit of time
None of the choices provided is correct
